casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Abner Ray NICHOLSON. No. 564A99-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Sofie Hosford, for Nicholson. Valerie B. Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

Abner Ray Nicholson, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of January 2004 by Defendant to Hold the Case in Abeyance Pending the Resolution of the Claim of Mental Retardation:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2004."

*397
